alert.note: Alert for Boone; Dallas; Polk; Story (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 9:44PM CDT until April 19 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Polk County in central Iowa... Southwestern Story County in central Iowa... Southeastern Boone County in central Iowa... Northeastern Dallas County in central Iowa... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 944 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Granger, or 5 miles northwest of Grimes, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Polk City and Saylorville Lake around 1000 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Madrid, Big Creek Lake, Big Creek State Park, Slater, Sheldahl, Alleman, Kelley and Huxley. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 99 and 102. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central Iowa.
